/* [DasNumUseCellMapper.xml] selectDasNumUseCellList */
SELECT UC.WAREHOUSE_KEY AS warehouseKey , UC.CELL_TYPE_STATUS AS cellTypeStatus , UC.DAS_CELL_GROUP_ID AS dasCellGroupId , (CASE WHEN UC.CELL_TYPE_STATUS = 'DELETE' THEN 0 ELSE UC.DAS_NUM_USE_CELL END) AS dasNumUseCell , '' AS dasNumAttr1 , '' AS dasNumAttr2 , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS batchRunDate , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') AS batchRunTime FROM o_wcs.TB_DAS_GROUPID_USE_CELL UC WHERE 1 = 1 AND UC.USE_CELL_INTF_YN = 'N' AND UC.CREATED_DATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-3, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY DAS_CELL_GROUP_ID ASC, MODIFIED_DATE ASC, MODIFIED_TIME ASC
